thread.title: Philips puts practicality and aesthetics in LED technology
thread.title_full: Philips puts practicality and aesthetics in LED technology | mb.com.ph | Philippine News

author: October 19, 2015
title: Philips puts practicality and aesthetics in LED technology
text:
October 19, 2015 Lighting industry veterans Philips has launched their new line of lighting solutions this month, including the Scene Switch Bulb, the Deco Classic, and the Candle and Luster LED bulbs.
“LED is the way of the future, and we want to make products that our consumers could build their lives around and depend on. These newer offerings are just some of them,” said Philips’ Country Marketing Manager for Lighting, Christine Villanueva.
The new line of LED-based products seeks to address practical lighting concerns, which are in turn affected by the aesthetic qualities of light as well. Studies compiled by the Illumination and Engineering Society (IES) show that lighting plays a crucial role in cycles of both productivity and relaxation in human beings. LED lighting also spells efficiency and low electric consumption.
Philips’ new range of LED solutions combine the practical and the visually appealing, providing perfect lighting to suit different activities carried out in various parts of a home or building. Scene Switch goes between cool white light and warm yellow daylight without any additional switch installation or re-wiring. Deco Classic takes design cues from mid-century light bulbs, but are exponentially more efficient. (CA Garcia)
